# Fixture reference & licensing

This directory aggregates small reference assets used for compression benchmarks and regressions. Please keep it lean and document sources and licenses for every added file.

## Existing assets

- `multi-agent.jpg`, `playground.png`, `rocket.png`: pre-existing project fixtures (origin not changed in this commit).

## Added assets

- `reference/squoosh_example.png` — copied from the Squoosh project (`codecs/example.png`), licensed under Apache 2.0. Source: https://github.com/GoogleChromeLabs/squoosh
- `reference/squoosh_example_palette.png` — copied from the Squoosh project (`codecs/example_palette.png`), licensed under Apache 2.0. Source: https://github.com/GoogleChromeLabs/squoosh

If you add new fixtures, list them here with source URL and license.
